aria-label="Read Full Review on Designli"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Designli is a Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android applications,
consistently praised for its responsiveness,
timeliness,
and exceptional project management. With 100% positive feedback noted across various reviews,
clients commend their clarity in communication and ability to transform visions into reality. Their flexibility and understanding of client needs are standout qualities,
making them a highly recommended partner for app development projects. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

project management,

>Developer Bazaar Technologies is a mobile app development company specializing in creating intuitive,
scalable applications for various industries,
including education,
fintech,
and wellness. Reviews highlight their expertise in mobile software development,
with 100% of clients praising their project management skills,
responsiveness,
and commitment to client satisfaction. They are noted for their proactive approach and ability to deliver high-quality,
user-friendly apps on time and within budget. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

with 100% of reviewers expressing satisfaction with their ability to meet project expectations and deadlines. Clients particularly highlight their adeptness in understanding requirements and providing innovative solutions,

>Demigos is a mobile app development company known for its high-quality mobile application development services. They have consistently impressed clients with their coding methodology,
communication skills,
and project management. Approximately 75% of reviewers highlight their reliability and promptness,
while 50% commend their ability to deliver projects on time,
even under challenging circumstances. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

generous,
knowledgeable,

aria-label="Read Full Review on Wve Labs"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Wve Labs is a distinguished Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android Development,
providing comprehensive services from UI/UX design to full app deployment. The overall feedback from clients is overwhelmingly positive,
with 100% of reviewers praising the company's project management, communication, and ability to meet timelines. Clients value their competitive pricing and impressive design standards, often highlighting the professionalism and dedication of Wve Labs' team. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>Reasonable pricing </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Reasonable pricing </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients consistently praised Wve Labs for their reasonable pricing,
highlighting it as a key factor in their decision to engage the firm. One client noted,

Their price point was very competitive compared to other agencies,
&#39;
while another stated,
&#39;
Wve&#39;
s ability to cater to college-aged students and provide a significantly lower hourly rate was impressive.&#39;
Overall,
feedback reflects a strong sentiment that Wve Labs offers high-quality services at affordable rates. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

aria-label="Read Full Review on MindSea"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>MindSea is a Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android development. Their reviews on Clutch.co indicate a strong reputation for effective project management and excellent communication,
with 100% of reviewers highlighting their professionalism and integrity. Clients praise MindSea for seamlessly integrating with teams and delivering high-quality products on time and within budget,
although some mention cost and resource estimation as areas for improvement. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"
href="/profile/mindsea#reviews"
title="See More projects on MindSea"
aria-label="See All the projects on MindSea"
class="provider__project-highlight-projects-link icon-arrow-for-after-element directory_profile "
data-link_text="See All the projects Profile Link"

>Personable </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Personable </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients consistently describe MindSea as personable and engaging,
highlighting the strong relationships fostered throughout the project. For instance,
one client appreciated the unique setup of having their designer also serve as project manager,
which enhanced communication and connection. Another client noted the team&#39;
s enjoyable and friendly demeanor,
making the collaboration a positive experience. Overall,
the sentiment regarding MindSea&#39;
s personable approach is overwhelmingly positive,
emphasizing their commitment to building strong client relationships. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Jafton is a dedicated Mobile App Development company specializing in creating and enhancing mobile applications with a strong emphasis on performance,
user experience,
and integration. Across various reviews,
100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills,
highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation,
the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive,
with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>iphonedroid is a mobile app development company specializing in Android and iOS development,
offering expertise in mobile application design and integration. Across their reviews,
100% of clients commend their mobile software development skills and project management proficiency,
highlighting their ability to enhance user engagement and satisfaction. Clients appreciate their innovative approach and ability to deliver value,
though some mention cost and speed as potential areas for improvement. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

evident from positive client feedback,

while 80% highlight their strategic approach and industry-specific insights. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

aria-label="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Memory Squared is a mobile app development company specializing in creating iOS and Android applications,
as well as backend and UX/UI design. They are frequently praised for their professionalism,
effective project management,
and commitment to understanding client needs,
boasting a 100% positive feedback rate across various reviews. Their team is notably recognized for their responsiveness,
flexibility,
and creative problem-solving capabilities. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"
href="/profile/memory-squared#reviews"
title="See More projects on Memory Squared"
aria-label="See All the projects on Memory Squared"
class="provider__project-highlight-projects-link icon-arrow-for-after-element directory_profile "
data-link_text="See All the projects Profile Link"
>See all 22 projects </a></div><div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list"><button class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
type="button"

>Collaborative </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Collaborative </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Memory Squared has received positive feedback regarding their collaborative approach. Clients highlighted the team&#39;
s exceptional project management,
responsiveness,
and ability to integrate client feedback dynamically. One client noted,
&#34;
The collaboration with Memory Squared not only resulted in a successful project but also gave us good perspectives regarding further product development.&#34;
Another remarked on the team&#39;
s commitment to understanding their vision,
stating,
&#34;
They often proposed details that went beyond the original scope,
which ultimately turned out to be decisive for the success of the platform.&#34;
</p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

><div class="provider-insight__review-body"><h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UI/UX Design for AI Tools Development Company</h5><div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating"><span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span><span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span><span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 26,
2024</span></div><p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">Then,
we cooperated with Memory Squared on the designs itself. The possibility of seeing real-time changes in Figma helped with the coordination,
as we didn’t have to wait for the designers to send us their work – we could always open the tab and see them but also leave our real-time comments concerning the changes. This level of collaboration ensured that our vision was accurately translated into a functional and visually appealing product. </p></div><a target="_blank"

><div class="provider-insight__review-body"><h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Advertising Company</h5><div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating"><span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span><span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span><span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 23,
2023</span></div><p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">The project was carried out in the timeline defined by our deadlines and by sincere description of the development team’s time abilities. We came to agreement with deadlines of every stage and both sides were consequent in holding onto them. Although on the discovery stage a lot of specification details were not described yet,
after the first few workshops we planned the timestamps of the project and,
thanks to the team's <b>commitment and agile work on both sides</b>, they became the frames of the decisions we made about products.

aria-label="Read Full Review on Commoditech"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Commoditech is a mobile app development company noted for its flexibility and customer-centric approach,
consistently delivering projects on time and within budget. Reviews indicate 100% positive feedback,
with recurring praise for their ability to adapt to client needs and provide skilled developers for iOS and Android projects. Their services are highly valued for understanding client requirements and aligning with company values. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>NOTUM Technologies is a versatile application development company specializing in mobile app development using React Native for both iOS and Android platforms. Known for their culture fit and value for cost,
they have received consistently positive feedback,
with 100% of reviewers praising their proactive approach and integration with client teams. Clients appreciate their timely delivery and effective project management,
though some suggest more critical thinking in simplifying frameworks. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>Efficient </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Efficient </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients have noted Notum Technologies&#39;
project management as highly efficient and professional. One client highlighted their responsiveness to business requirements and incorporation of feedback,
which contributed to a successful web application development. The technical expertise demonstrated by Notum,

the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their effective and timely service. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

>Hard working </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Hard working </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients have consistently highlighted Appinventiv&#39;
s hard-working nature throughout their projects. One client noted that the developers maintained effective communication and made every effort to enhance their app idea,
ultimately delivering a market-ready application. Another client praised their passion for challenging projects,
emphasizing their commitment to not only deliver the application but also act as a technology consultant. Overall,
the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Appinventiv&#39;
s dedication and work ethic. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

2017</span></div><p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">From day one,
they showed complete interest in our idea and discussed possibilities to ensure the success of our app idea. <b>They worked at a great pace and delivered impressive designs and other associated components within the time specified</b>. aria-label="Read Full Review on Grey Chain"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Grey Chain is a proficient mobile app development company specializing in iOS and Android development,
with a commendable reputation for providing scalable and innovative solutions. Across various reviews,
100% of respondents praised their project management,
timely communication,
and dedication,
while 80% highlighted their ability to align with company values and deliver high-quality products. Grey Chain's commitment to client satisfaction and technical excellence is consistently emphasized in client feedback.

>Communicative </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Communicative </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients have consistently praised Grey Chain for their exceptional communication skills and project management. Feedback highlights their proactive approach,
with one client noting they were &#39;
always available for last-minute calls&#39;
despite time zone differences. Another client emphasized the team&#39;
s &#39;
constant communication&#39;
and timely updates,
stating that they felt like a &#39;
top priority client.&#39;
Overall,
the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Grey Chain&#39;
s commitment to keeping all stakeholders informed and engaged throughout the project lifecycle. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

2023</span></div><p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">Grey Chain team has a great project management and are very process oriented with having customer first focus. >+6 services </span></div><div class="provider__services-list-item">5% Cybersecurity</div><div class="provider__services-list-item">5% E-Commerce Development</div><div class="provider__services-list-item">5% IT Strategy Consulting</div><div class="provider__services-list-item">5% Wearable App Development</div><div class="provider__services-list-item">1% Web Design</div><div class="provider__services-list-item">1% Web Development</div></div></div></div><div data-new-summary="true" class="provider__description"><div class="provider__project-highlight-text provider__project-highlight-text--summary sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed"><p title="Read Full Review on Techne."
aria-label="Read Full Review on Techne."
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Techne. is a highly regarded mobile app development company that excels in creating bespoke applications for iOS and Android platforms. The company garners overwhelmingly positive feedback for its commitment to client success,
proactive communication,
and technical prowess,
with 100% of reviewers praising their project management skills and dedication to fostering long-term partnerships. Clients particularly appreciate Techne.'s ability to deliver user-friendly and feature-rich applications that align with their business goals.

data-link_text="See All the projects Profile Link"

>Unique expertise </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Unique expertise </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients consistently praise Techne for their unique expertise in mobile app development. One CEO noted their ability to transform initial concepts into viable products,
highlighting their proactive approach and deep understanding of client needs. Another client commended their thoroughness and technical capabilities,
stating that Techne&#39;
s team took the time to grasp project requirements fully. Overall,
the sentiment reflects strong confidence in Techne&#39;
s capabilities,
with clients feeling genuinely supported and invested in their success. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

including iOS and Android platforms. Across reviews,

timely delivery,
and technical expertise. They are particularly praised for their ability to create user-friendly and efficient solutions,

aria-label="Read Full Review on Five Pack"
class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
>Five Pack is a distinguished mobile app development company that excels in iOS and Android development. Across numerous reviews,
they stand out for their responsiveness,
project management efficiency,
and ability to integrate seamlessly with clients' teams, resulting in successful app launches and ongoing enhancements. Approximately 90% of reviewers highlight their professionalism and partnership approach, noting their capacity to deliver projects on time while accommodating evolving client needs.

>Passionate about their work </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Passionate about their work </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">Clients consistently highlight Five Pack Creative&#39;
s passion for their work,
emphasizing a collaborative partnership approach. One client noted,

They were the only ones that were so passionate about working together,
&#39;
illustrating their commitment beyond typical contractor-client dynamics. Their responsiveness and proactive communication further reinforce this sentiment,
as clients feel genuinely supported throughout the project. Overall,
the feedback reflects a strong appreciation for Five Pack&#39;
s dedication and enthusiasm in bringing client visions to life. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"

>Panaxeo is a distinguished mobile app development company specializing in creating custom applications and digital solutions across various platforms,
including Android and iOS. Consistently praised for their seamless project management and timely delivery,
100% of reviews highlight their expertise in mobile application development,
often exceeding client expectations by proactively offering enhancements. Their notable strengths include problem-solving abilities and maintaining high standards of professionalism and responsiveness. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>Knowit,
previously known as Cybercom,
is a technology consulting firm specializing in cloud solutions,
IoT products,
and enterprise-grade applications. Reviews highlight their proactive approach,
expertise in software and hardware integration,
and effective project management,
resulting in the successful delivery of complex projects. Approximately 90% of reviewers commend their technical proficiency and customer orientation,
with no significant areas for improvement noted. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>Trustworthy </button><section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight"><div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content"><div class="provider-insight__summary"><h4 class="provider-insight__title">Reviews mention Trustworthy </h4><p class="provider-insight__description">The feedback regarding Cybercom reflects a strong sentiment of trustworthiness. Clients highlighted the company&#39;
s commitment to building long-term,
trust-based relationships,
exemplified by their patience during the client&#39;
s restructuring process. The project manager emphasized Cybercom&#39;
s open-mindedness and customer-oriented approach,
ensuring a collaborative environment. Overall,
the client found the engagement to be valuable,
noting that Cybercom&#39;
s advisory expertise helped avoid potential pitfalls,
reinforcing their reliability and trustworthiness in project execution. </p></div><div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container"><ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark"><li class="provider-insight__review"
data-gtm_provider_id="35422"
data-gtm_index="0"
data-gtm_review_id="72620"
data-gtm_insight_id="1733366"
><div class="provider-insight__review-body"><h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile Development For Mechanical Engineering Firm</h5><div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating"><span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span><span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span><span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 11,
2016</span></div><p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">When we initially started our collaboration with Cybercom,
we couldn't immediately begin development because our company was going through a restructuring process. <b>Cybercom waited patiently for us and provided support for me in selling the concept internally</b>. I could tell that <b>Cybercom aimed to build a long-term, trust-based relationship with us</b>.

>many-to-many is a reputable mobile app development company,
specializing in iOS and Android development alongside backend architecture. Across their reviews,
they are praised for their project management,
communication,
and ability to deliver high-quality work on time. Approximately 90% of reviewers highlight their impressive speed and quality of development,
while 80% emphasize their adaptability and problem-solving skills,
establishing them as a reliable partner in mobile software development. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

they offer good value for money and demonstrate flexibility and attentiveness to customer needs. Approximately 90% of reviews highlight their excellent communication and the ability to execute projects efficiently,
from conceptualization to final release,

>RNDpoint is a mobile software development company specializing in fintech solutions,
particularly for iOS and Android platforms. Reviews highlight their expertise in fintech technology and praise their responsive and professional team. The company has received 100% positive feedback,
with clients appreciating their swift project execution and effective project management. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

>BinarApps is a mobile app development company known for its high level of professionalism and agile methodologies in enhancing and building apps on both iOS and Android platforms. Reviews highlight their strong project management and effective team integration,
with 100% positive feedback regarding their collaborative approach and technical prowess. Clients appreciate their user-focused solutions and seamless communication,
making them a reliable partner in mobile software development. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

particularly in iOS and Android Development. The company has received overwhelmingly positive feedback,
with approximately 100% of reviewers highlighting their impressive project management,
attention to detail,
and pragmatic problem-solving skills. >TemaBit is a Mobile App Development company specializing in creating comprehensive mobile applications for major retail networks. With a strong focus on digital transformation,
TemaBit has successfully developed native iOS and Android applications,
achieving significant business impacts,
such as over one million unique users and improved personalization. Reviews indicate a professional,
agile approach and a motivated team,
with 100% of feedback highlighting their effective project management and commitment to quality. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

offering expertise in both Android and iOS development. The company consistently receives positive feedback,
with clients praising their flexibility,
commitment,
and impressive speed in delivering results. While some reviews suggest room for improvement in design ownership,
75% of reviewers commend their competitive pricing and effective communication. Overall,

>MobiDev Corporation is a leading Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android solutions,
with extensive expertise in creating advanced applications with AR and VR technologies. The company receives overwhelmingly positive feedback,
with clients praising their disciplined project management and exceptional communication. Approximately 95% of reviewers highlight their adaptability and high-quality product delivery,
emphasizing their effective team scaling and commitment to client satisfaction. <div class="provider__more-container"><button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Button text" aria-expanded="false">Show More </button></div></div><a target="_blank"

data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
><span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">How the Leaders Matrix Works </span></button><div class="container sg-accordion__contents"><div class="lm-methodology__column-1"><p class="lm-methodology__text">A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver. The size of each circle indicates that company’s size. <a target="_blank"
href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
class="lm-methodology__link"
aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
>Learn More </a></p></div><div class="lm-methodology__column-2"><p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b>(x-axis)</p><p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p><p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b>(y-axis)</p><p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p><ol class="lm-methodology__list"><li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li><li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li><li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li></ol></div></div></div></div></div><div id="lm-providers__section" class="lm-only-related-block lm-providers sg-container"><h2 class="providers__list-title">List of the Top 15 Europe Mobile App Development Companies</h2><ol class="providers__list"><li class="provider-list-item" id="provider-28773"><div class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider--lm-provider provider-row--non-ppc "

            return !U(this.element)&&"img" !==S(this.element)&&this.original_content===this.getSnapshot(this.element)
        }

        details() {
            let t=this.getSnapshot(this.element),
            e="";

            return H.has(this.mode)&&this.original_content===t||(e=t),
            {
            uuid: this.id, mode:this.mode, selector:this.selector, new_content:e
        }
    }

    getSnapshot(t) {
        return t.innerHTML
    }

    cancel() {
        this.element.innerHTML=this.current_content
    }

    reset() {
        X(this.id, this.element)
    }

    constructor(t, e) {

        this.element=t,
        this.mode=e,
        this.current_content="",
        this.id=tn(t, e),
        this.id||(this.id=function t(e=0) {

                        n
                    }

                        I
                    }

        }

        this.current_content=this.getSnapshot(t)
    }
}

class te extends tt {
    getSnapshot(t) {
        return JSON.stringify(this.makeAttributesSnapshot(t))
    }

    isOriginal() {
        return this.getSnapshot(this.element)===JSON.stringify(this.makeBackupSnapshot(this.element))
    }

    isModified() {
        return this.getSnapshot(this.element) !==JSON.stringify(this.current_attrs)
    }

    setHTML(t) {
        this.current_content=t
    }

    cancel() {
        this.restoreAttributes(this.current_attrs)
    }

    reset() {
        this.restoreAttributes(this.current_attrs)
    }

    details() {

        let t=this.makeAttributesSnapshot(this.element),
        e= {}

        ;
        for(let[n, r]of Object.entries(t))r !==this.current_attrs[n]&&(e[n]=(null==r?void 0:r.toString())||"");

        return {
            uuid: this.id, mode:this.mode, selector:this.selector, new_content:this.current_content, attrs:e
        }
    }

    makeAttributesSnapshot(t) {
        let e=function(t) {
            let e= {}

            ;

            return Array.from(t.attributes).forEach(t=> {
                    m.has(t.name)?e[t.name]= !0:e[t.name]=t.value

                }),
            Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(e).filter(([t])=> !t.includes(`data-$ {
                            a
                        }

                        `)))
        }

        (t);
        for(let t of te.IGNORED_ATTRS)delete e[t];
        return this.parent_element||delete e.style,
        e
    }

    makeBackupSnapshot(t) {
        let e= {}

        ;

        for(let n of Array.from(t.attributes))if(n.name.startsWith ("data-" +a)) {
            if(n.name==="data-" +Q||te.IGNORED_ATTRS.has(n.name)|| !this.parent_element&&"style"===n.name)continue;
            e[n.name.replace("data-" +a, "")]=n.value
        }

        return e
    }

    restoreAttributes(t) {
        for(let e of Array.from(this.element.attributes))if( !e.name.startsWith ("data-" +a)&& !te.IGNORED_ATTRS.has(e.name))for(let[n, r]of(e.name in t||this.element.removeAttribute(e.name), Object.entries(t)))null===r||""===r?this.element.removeAttribute(n): this.element.setAttribute(n, r.toString())
    }

    constructor(t, e) {
        super(e||t, n.UPDATE_ATTRIBUTES),
        this.element=t,
        this.parent_element=e||null,
        this.current_attrs=this.makeAttributesSnapshot(t),
        this.backup_attrs=this.makeBackupSnapshot(t)
    }
}

function tn(t, e) {
    let r=t.dataset[Z];
    if( !r)return"";

    try {
        let t=r.split(" ");

        if(void 0 !==e) {
            if(e===n.UPDATE_CSS)return t.find(t=>t.includes("_css"))||"";
            return t.find(t=> !t.includes("_css"))||""
        }

        return t.pop()
    }

    catch(t) {
        return""
    }
}

function tr(t, e) {
    let n=tn(t);
    n&&0>n.indexOf(e)&&(e=n+" " +e),
    t.dataset[Z]=e
}

function ti(t) {
    return p(`[data-$ {
            Q
        }

        ~="${t}"]`)
}

te.IGNORED_ATTRS=new Set(["contenteditable"]);

class ts {
    setUrls(t) {
        this.url_regex=RegExp(t, "i")
    }

    matches(t) {
        return ! !this.url_regex&&this.url_regex.test(t)
    }

    matchesCurrentPage() {
        return this.matches(window.location.pathname)
    }

    constructor() {
        this.url_regex=null,
        this.modifications=new Map
    }
}

function to(t, e) {
    return`$ {
        t
    }

    -attr-$ {
        e
    }

    `
}

function tl(t, e, n) {
    let r=j(e, to(t, n));
    r?e.setAttribute(n, r): e.removeAttribute(n)
}

let ta=(t, e, n)=> {
    n.forEach(n=> {
            tl(t, e, n)
        })
}

;

    return -1===t.indexOf("[")||t.length>1e3?t:t+", "+t.replace("[", `[data-$ {
            a
        }

        `)
}
